long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The UserTesting Browser Recorder is an extension that records your screen and audio when you are providing feedback on websites or other digital experiences for usability or research studies.

With this extension, you will be able to:
  - View tasks (actions you are being asked to undertake, typically online)
  - Answer questions, either aloud or by typing out your responses
